companyDescription: B2B SaaS platform providing project management and collaboration tools for remote teams. We help distributed teams stay organized, communicate effectively, and deliver projects on time.
marketingFeedback: Previous agency focused too heavily on vanity metrics. We need better qualified leads and improved conversion rates. Looking for a data-driven approach with clear ROI.
analyticsNotes: GA4 fully implemented with custom events. HubSpot CRM tracks full customer journey. Monthly active users around 2,500. Main concern is improving trial-to-paid conversion rate.
primaryGoal: Increase qualified demo requests by 60% and improve trial-to-paid conversion rate from 12% to 20%
successDefinition: Success means generating 150+ qualified demos per month with a conversion rate above 18%, while maintaining CAC under $800. We also want to see organic traffic grow by 40% YoY.
revenueTarget: $3M ARR by end of year (currently at $1.8M ARR)
idealCustomerProfile: Mid-market companies (100-1000 employees) in tech, consulting, and creative industries. Decision makers are typically Operations Managers, Project Directors, or CTOs aged 32-50. They value efficiency, transparency, and team collaboration.
geographicTargeting: North America (primary), UK and Western Europe (secondary expansion)
competitorStrengths: Asana has strong brand recognition and enterprise features. Monday.com excels at visual project tracking. ClickUp offers extensive customization. All have larger marketing budgets and established user bases.
